name: Ricky Rolled
description:
You live in a world where everything depends on your current number. It will be your cunning and skill as a 6 face dice that will provide your survival. Roll, roll, roll to keep yourself alive, because everyone is trying to kill you. Along the way, you’ll face the question: Is chance our friend… or our enemy?

==========Control==========

WASD - Move around

Space - Jump

Q - Reroll the number

LeftMouse - Throw your head (yes.....)
